title: Agricultural and Marine Products Direct Market
content: Zone 1 is an area where you can trust and purchase fresh agricultural and marine products from Miryang. By utilizing blockchain technology, we ensure the transparency of transactions and implement various systems to allow consumers to buy with confidence.

title: Ecosystem Expansion and Partnerships
content: We are expanding the ecosystem to enable the use of THW tokens in conjunction with other services and platforms. By partnering with local tourist attractions and shops, we broaden the range of uses for the tokens, enhancing their utility. Additionally, we plan to offer benefits by establishing MOUs with hospitals, allowing the use of THW tokens for services within medical facilities.

title: Ease of Use
content: Binance Chain offers a user-friendly interface, allowing users to conduct transactions easily and conveniently. This enhances the user experience and encourages more users to participate in the project.
